abstract: By the end of this summer, five Washington television stations will be broadcasting in a new format designed to be received on cellphones, laptops and other gadgets.
snippet: By the end of this summer, five Washington television stations will be broadcasting in a new format designed to be received on cellphones, laptops and other gadgets.
lead_paragraph: Update | 2:32 p.m.  Cost to broadcast stations modified.

headline.main: Free TV Broadcasting Comes to Mobile Gadgets
